Class SeasonalMenuManager

java.lang.Object
com.csce331.project2.ui.SeasonalMenuManager
public class SeasonalMenuManager extends Object
Manages seasonal menu items and provides UI components for adding seasonal menu items and required inventory items to the database.
Author:
Noble

  • Method Details

    • createSeasonalMenuPanel

      public JPanel createSeasonalMenuPanel()
      Creates and returns a JPanel containing the seasonal menu management interface. The panel includes form fields for adding seasonal menu items and buttons for various operations including adding inventory items.
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the seasonal menu management interface

    • clearForm

      private void clearForm(JTextField idField, JTextField nameField, JTextField priceField, JTextArea ingredientsArea)
      Clears all form fields and resets the ingredients area to default placeholder text.
      Parameters:
      idField - the text field for menu item ID
      nameField - the text field for item name
      priceField - the text field for item price
      ingredientsArea - the text area for ingredients JSON

    • showAddInventoryDialog

      private void showAddInventoryDialog(JPanel parent)
      Shows a dialog for adding required inventory items to the database. The dialog contains form fields for item ID, name, and quantity.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent panel to center the dialog relative to
